version_description:
Thanks for being a part of Brainly! We always strive to improve our apps for you, which is why we send updates every few weeks. The easiest way to get the most up to date app is to enable automatic updates in your settings. Simply go to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads section, and turn on "Updates".

Every update will enhance your Brainly experience and introduce improvements in speed and stability. And don't worry, we'll let you know whenever we add an update or a new feature to the app!

With this release, we've updated our networking layer to improve the safety of our system.
There are also some other bugfixes:
* notifications list now loads without a hassle,
* a fix for a potential crash when opening the application from an external link.

Thanks for being a part of Brainly! We always strive to improve our apps for you, which is why we send updates every few weeks. Every update will enhance your Brainly experience and introduce improvements in speed and stability.

* Known errors are now displayed properly
* Fixed an issue when the application might be left in an error loop after changing the country

Now users can subscribe to our newest, highest tier, Brainly Tutor. With a Brainly Tutor subscription, students get all the freedoms of Brainly Plus plus unlimited access to live 1-on-1 tutoring, 24/7. That means students always have a teaching professional handy to explain and clarify a scholastic problem until they truly understand it.

Thanks for being a part of Brainly! We always strive to improve our apps for you, which is why we send updates every few weeks. Every update will enhance your Brainly experience and introduce improvements in speed and stability.
